translations: 离职生养小孩一段时间后复职的妇女；回击者

sentences.sentence: And he would be a once-returner, a non-returner, or at the very least a stream-winner.
sentences.translation: 他可以成为一还者、不还者、或者至少成为入流者。

sentences.sentence: Smith was primarily used as a punt returner with the Bills, averaging 13.2 yards. He also returned one punt for a touchdown.
sentences.translation: 史密斯在布法罗比尔主要担任弃踢回攻手，平均每次弃踢回攻13.2码，并有一次弃踢回攻达阵。

sentences.sentence: High strength in medium temperature, stable volume in high temperature, wear-proof, anti-slag corrosion, material returner, coal-saver furnace wall and mixing chamber inner wall etc.
sentences.translation: 中温强度高，高温体积稳定，耐磨损，抗熔渣侵蚀。返料器、省煤器炉墙、混合室内墙等部位。
